attributes.action: admit the mistakes made by the British Armed Forces on "Bloody Sunday"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Brtish Government should admit that on the 30th of January of 1972 British soldiers opened fire on innocent british civillians. The British soldiers present at the times alleged that the had only shot individuals they believed posed a threat to them however many innocent people were injured or killed including chldren. I demand an aknowledgement of the mistakes made.

rejection.details: The Government has established a Bloody Sunday inquiry which is ongoing.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
